summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the multi-page Recalibrate landing site restructure. All pages load correctly with proper routing, navigation, and forms working as expected.

minor_validation_issues.issue: Validation errors return 422 instead of 400 for empty/invalid emails
minor_validation_issues.impact: Very minor - proper validation is working, just different HTTP status code

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero, how it works, hub navigation cards, FAQ, and final CTA sections
Navigation bar shows Features, Protocol, Pricing, Partners, Resources, Contact Us links and 'Go to App' button correctly
'Go to App' button in navbar links to https://recalibratepain.app and opens in new tab
/features page loads with 6 feature cards and evidence-based section
/protocol page loads with hero, 8 biological systems, what's included, research section, and pricing CTA ($149.99)
Protocol CTA buttons link to https://recalibratepain.app/protocol and open in new tab
/pricing page loads with 4 subscription plans (Free, Go, Pro, Super) + lifetime option
/partners page loads with 3 partner cards (Clinics, Research, Investors) and partner form modals work
/resources page loads with blog preview, courses link, and support link
Hub navigation cards (Features, Protocol, Pricing, Partners, Resources, Blog) all link to correct pages
Active nav link is highlighted correctly on each page
Contact Us button in nav opens contact modal with working form
Waitlist form on hub page submits email to backend API successfully
Footer shows on all pages with correct links and social media
/blog page loads with multiple articles and categories
Backend API health check working (46 subscribers, MongoDB + JSON backup)
Backend waitlist join, partner contact, and data export endpoints working
All external links (recalibratepain.app, etsy.com, ko-fi.com) work correctly
Partner form modals open and display correctly with proper form fields
All form submissions successfully reach backend APIs
